overview_summary: The neighboring organizational landowners are a small private realty LLC tied to a local business and another low-profile holding company. 483 Sawyer LLC is essentially the property-holding entity for an insulation contractor’s facility, indicating limited broader influence. Upward Realty LLC appears to be a passive land investment with obscure ownership and no visible community role, suggesting minimal direct opposition or support risk.

neighbors.name: Upward Realty LLC
neighbors.claims: Upward Realty LLC is registered as a New York limited liability company, one of over 2.5 million business entities on file with the state ([polepoleto.com](https://polepoleto.com/us-ny?page=8&zip=14223#:~:text=This%20dataset%20includes%20over%202,type%2C%20initial%20filling%20date%2C%20etc)). It has no publicly listed officers or active operations; state records provide only a mailing address and use the Secretary of State as agent for service ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/grand-island/483-sawyer-llc#:~:text=Service%20of%20Process%20on%20the,Secretary%20of%20State%20as%20Agent)). The LLC appears to function purely as a landholding entity for its Tonawanda parcel, with no evident involvement in development projects or community initiatives (beneficial owners remain undisclosed) ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/grand-island/483-sawyer-llc#:~:text=Service%20of%20Process%20on%20the,Secretary%20of%20State%20as%20Agent)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Owns a single parcel; no known local profile or political engagement; anonymous ownership
neighbors.approach_recommendations: Identify the principal through property records or outreach (likely via the LLC’s registered address); emphasize how the project could enhance their land value or offer a buyout. Monitor their position but expect neutrality unless the project impacts their parcel value.

neighbors.name: 483 Sawyer LLC
neighbors.claims: 483 Sawyer LLC was formed on December 23, 2015 and remains an active New York LLC in good standing ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/grand-island/483-sawyer-llc#:~:text=483%20Sawyer%20LLC%20is%20a,active%20status%20in%20state%20records)). Its official mailing address is 124 Park Place in Grand Island, NY ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/grand-island/483-sawyer-llc#:~:text=The%20mailing%20address%20of%20the,the%20company%27s%20activities%20and%20communications)), and it serves as the holding company for the property at 483 Sawyer Avenue in Tonawanda. That site is occupied by EnerGsmart Foam Insulation, a local commercial/residential insulation contractor that has operated in the Buffalo area since 2004 ([www.mapquest.com](https://www.mapquest.com/us/new-york/energsmart-443558263#:~:text=Energsmart%20Foam%20Insulation%20has%20been,offering%20a%20range%20of%20high)) ([energsmart.com](https://energsmart.com/contact/#:~:text=483%20Sawyer%20Ave,8057%20fax)). No individual managers are listed in public filings (service of process goes to the LLC’s Grand Island address) ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/grand-island/483-sawyer-llc#:~:text=Service%20of%20Process%20on%20the,Secretary%20of%20State%20as%20Agent)). The company has no public history of civic or political activity, suggesting its role is limited to owning the facility for the insulation business’s use ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/grand-island/483-sawyer-llc#:~:text=Service%20of%20Process%20on%20the,Secretary%20of%20State%20as%20Agent)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small business-affiliated landowner; influence confined to its own operations; no noted political or social leverage
neighbors.approach_recommendations: Engage the owner via the on-site business (EnerGsmart) to address any concerns about construction or project impact on their operations. Emphasize benefits (e.g., improved infrastructure or potential business opportunities) and ensure the project does not disrupt their facility. Given their local stake, maintaining goodwill with this neighbor can secure their neutrality or support.

That's interesting because the contact points to the property address, not 124 Park Place, which seems to serve as the mailing address for the LLC registry. **Summarizing LLC and business details**

The LLC's mailing address is likely linked to the owner's residence in Grand Island, while the property at 483 Sawyer Avenue is home to EnerGsmart Insulation. This implies the LLC functions mainly as a holding company for that business. It was established on December 23, 2015, with the document number 4868757. **Analyzing business involvement and classification**

Energsmart is identified as an insulation contractor in Buffalo, with the property at 483 Sawyer utilized for their operations. There’s no known political involvement or significant contributions from the owner, as we can't name them easily.
